body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.5 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for animated cursors.
Printing directly through CUPS instead of lpr.
Installer fixes for Office 2010.
Many MSXML3 improvements.
Improved Shader Model 4 support.
Proper icons in built-in Internet Explorer.
Translation updates.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
